Description:
Full-time English-speaking Nanny required for G2 in Taiwan. Salary £70000 – £85000 per annum, live in. Start ASAP
An American family located in Taiwan is seeking an experienced Nanny to assist with the care of their young daughter aged 2.
As a Nanny, you will be responsible for meeting the daily needs of the child; providing a high standard of care, and ensuring she is reaching all age-appropriate milestones and development. You will be required to create engaging play, games, and activities to further her development, assist with organising schedules and teach manners and etiquette.
The young girl attends playschool daily and returns home around lunchtime each day, you will be required to collect her from playschool and provide fun, engaging activities.
The ideal candidate will be a qualified Nanny who has experience working with children of this age. The Nanny should be confident in sole charge. Being able to work as a team with the parents is essential for this role.
The family travel regularly and the candidate will be required to travel with them.
This is a live-in position with a private bedroom provided within the client’s home.
The working schedule will be 6 days on with 1 day off, working up to 10 hours per day. Flexibility is required.
Interviews are taking place immediately
